縬字的基本解释

縬
cù
缩。
丝织品的彩文。

縬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cù］
［《廣韻》子六切，入屋，精。］
缩。

縬字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　縬； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页935第24
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?子六切，音蹙。縮也。又縬紋也。【類篇】一曰繒文。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?側六切，音?。聚文也。或作?縐。

縬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
縬字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cù］
["Guangyun" has six cuts, enters the house, and is refined. ]
Shrink.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　縬; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 935 Page 24
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Sub-six cuts, sound floppy. Shrink also. There is also a pattern. 【Classes】One is the scripture.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Side six cuts, sound?. Juwen also. Or make a crepe.
